类型: Size: One SizeColor: Black - Hellbound Heathen
评论详情: 5'7" ~150lbs Ordered size Medium.  Have tried this style of pant before and been disappointed but these are excellent.  Fit is perfect. Whimsically baggy with a thick, comfortable drawstring elastic waistband & very stretchy.  Durable quality fabric, not see-through, droopy or stretchy. Instead they are almost coarse but not at all scratchy or irritating. They hold their own form and I love the silhouette with a tight shirt.  Good in the heat but one could easily put leggings beneath them in cold weather.  The pattern on the side appears to be dyed, so it will not peel as the garment ages like an adhesive print would.  Pocket on one side only but it is sewn well & was delighted to see it can be zipped closed. The zipper sits below the top of the pockets, concealing it in an attractive way. Can easily hold my phone as well as a few other items. Does not weigh down the pants in an unflattering way or cause the pocket to droop.  I love them & would definitely recommend.
